reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater has a perfect oversized fit, is comfortable, and has good quality after washing.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars My New Favorite Cozy-Chic Fall Sweater
items.body: I’m officially obsessed with the PRETTY GARDEN Women’s Oversized Chunky Knitted Pullover—it’s everything I want in a fall sweater and then some. The first thing I noticed was how soft and comfortable it is. Chunky sweaters can sometimes feel heavy or itchy, but this one is surprisingly lightweight while still being warm. It gives that perfect oversized look without drowning you—exactly the effortless, cozy vibe I was hoping for. The knit pattern is gorgeous and feels high-quality, and the relaxed fit makes it easy to tuck slightly into jeans or leggings for a super flattering outfit. I’ve worn it for casual days out, work-from-home days, and even a chilly evening at an outdoor event, and it looked stylish every single time. One of my favorite things? It’s true oversized, but the sleeves and hem don’t stretch out or lose shape. I’ve already washed it once (delicate cycle, air dry), and it came out looking brand new. I’ve received multiple compliments on this sweater—even from strangers—and now I’m debating which color to order next because I’m definitely grabbing another one. If you want a sweater that’s comfortable, warm, stylish, and incredibly easy to wear, this is a fall must-have. Highly recommend! Read more
items.author: Evie Scarborough

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice Sweater
items.body: Fits well, the material felt nice as well. Not as baggy as I was hoping but still a little baggy that it fit comfortably one me. A very pretty shade of blue! It has a good weight as well to the material. Read more
items.author: Vii

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Warm and cozy
items.body: I was seeking for a cozy sweater to warm with leggings and came across this item. I can now understand the mix reviews. I ordered the dark green sweater in medium based on description and measurements. It was definitely baggy a bit too boxy for me and long in a size medium. I then ordered a size small in hopes I get same look but in a lil more fitting look. In my picture the small is played over the medium. The small and medium have very lil difference in length and width. Recommend size down is a must. I’m hoping a throwing in dryer for a couple mins will shrink a bit. The quality of the sweater is warm but double check the seams because my medium was coming undone at shoulder and wrist in the sweater. But sweater is soft. Read more
items.author: Westchester, NY

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pink Comfort
items.body: This sweater is soft and not itchy like I thought it would be. I washed and dried it on delicate mode. I usually wear a size large but I noticed the large said size 12-14 which still fit perfect and didn’t swallow me. Read more
items.author: Robyn W.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love!
items.body: This was my first time purchasing from PrettyGarden, and I’m very happy with my order. The sweater is beautiful and was packaged very nicely I wish I’d gotten a picture before opening it, but I was too excited to wait. I ordered an XL (I included a picture of the tag), and for reference I normally wear an XL–XXL depending on the fit. I’m 7 months postpartum and breastfeeding, so my weight fluctuates between 195–207 lbs, and the forgiving design of this sweater makes it flattering and comfortable at any point on that range. I’m also sharing my height and body shape since that’s helpful for others reading reviews. I’m 5'2", an apple body shape, picture smaller legs with a fuller upper body and as a mom of three boys, I’ve got a bit of a postpartum “kangaroo pouch.” Because I’m on the shorter side, the sweater fits a little longer on me, almost like an oversized style, which I love since it gives me great belly coverage. The material is thick and I’m not going to lie the material is a bit more scratchy but I don’t mind it but others might. For fall, it’s perfect on its own, and in winter you may want to layer with a jacket or blazer depending on your weather. I’m in Tennessee, so that’s what I’m basing it on. The sweater feels durable and well-made, and I can honestly see it lasting a long time. Read more
items.author: Amber Daugherty

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Eh
items.body: Unfortunately this sweater drowwwwwwwwned me. Returned. Read more
items.author: Ainsley

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super cute
items.body: Nice fall color! Great fit without being to oversized. Hangs nicely. Was perfect for our fall photo shoot. Read more
items.author: Amanda Davidson

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for fall!
items.body: Oversized, but perfect for fall. I’m usually an XL and I ordered a large and it still was pretty oversized. Good quality after washing also! Read more
items.author: Aaliyah Borchert

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Blue, Army Green, Black, Camel, Coffee, Orange, Navy, Wine Red, Khaki, Pink, White, Beige, Heather Pink, Dark Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: One Size.
